text: The Ferqui Soroco is a body of a minicoach. It was built from 2008 to 2012 by Ferqui. It was built on the Mercedes-Benz Sprinter chassis. In the United Kingdom, it was made by Optare and it was called Optare Soroco. == Related pages == * List of bus models == References == == Other websites == * Soroco
title: Ferqui Soroco
